alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Geary; Pottawatomie; Riley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 10:44PM CDT until May 30 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Dickinson County in central Kansas... Northwestern Geary County in east central Kansas... Southern Riley County in northeastern Kansas... Southwestern Pottawatomie County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1044 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles west of Keats to 3 miles southwest of Chapman, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manhattan, Junction City, Ogden, Grandview Plaza, Chapman, Milford, Milford Lake, Moonlight and Keats. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 278 and 309. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
